thread.section_title: Futonland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Futonland | futonland.com
thread.title: Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text: Nas was great to work with. He was very helpful. He knew everything and provided print outs and dimensions to help us narrow down our search, as like most areas in NYC space is a premium! We bought the j&m furniture jk038 full size futon/sofa bed. Like most futons it is hard so I'd recommend a foam topper of some sort, which we also purchased while we were here at futon land. The futon itself is great quality and looks very stylish/modern. It even has a recliner bar on one side to lean the sofa bed back to your desired recline angle. Very durable/sturdy. This is not a futon you will keep in one apt and then dispose of a year or two later. This one will definitely come with us over the years wherever we go next!
